oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Incrementare i benefici multifunzionali delle colture consociate (InterVeg)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ortolani, Livia
Canali, Stefano
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Education, extension and communication
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The presentation has been used to illustrate the CORE Organic II project InterVeg structure to the Italian farmer during a public meeting held by the University of Sassari for the end of a national project on similar topic.
